articles.author: Staff Writer
articles.title: LDP's Takaichi set to become PM as Japan Innovation agrees to coalition - Nikkei Asia
articles.description: Diet to pick first female prime minister on Tuesday but minority rule may continue
articles.content: TOKYO -- Sanae Takaichi, leader of the ruling Liberal Democratic Party, is set to become Japan's first female prime minister after the LDP and the Japan Innovation Party formally signed a coalition a… [+4594 chars]
